meta:
song = {
'artist':'En Vogue',
'song':'Don't Let Go (Love)',
'lyrics':'What's it gonna be 'cuz I can't pretend
Don't you want to be more than friends
Hold me tight and don't let go
Don't let go
You have the right to lose control
Don't let go

I often tell myself that we could be more than just friends
I know you think that if we move too soon it would[...]',
'url':'http://lyrics.wikia.com/En_Vogue:Don%27t_Let_Go_%28Love%29'

lyrics:
What's it gonna be 'cuz I can't pretend
Don't you want to be more than friends
Hold me tight and don't let go
Don't let go
You have the right to lose control
Don't let go

I often tell myself that we could be more than just friends
I know you think that if we move too soon it would[...]
